title: Ferrari announces its embracing crypto payments amid market demands
description:
Joining the growing list of companies accepting cryptocurrency, renowned luxury sports car manufacturer Ferrari is now accepting digital currency payments for its vehicles in the U.S., with plans to expand the service to Europe in response to demand from wealthy clients. As reported by Reuters, this move comes amidst the hesitation of most prominent companies to […]

The post Ferrari announces its embracing crypto payments amid market demands appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Atlassian’s $1 Billion Bet on Loom: A Strategic Acquisition in the World of AI-Powered Video Collaboration and Productivity
description: Atlassian, the productivity software giant, has recently made a significant move in the tech industry by agreeing to acquire Loom, an asynchronous video messaging platform, for a whopping $975 million. While the price tag may raise eyebrows, this acquisition marks Atlassian’s strategic pivot towards enhancing its product suite to cater to the ever-evolving needs of ... Read more

title: Inflation’s sneaky grip: World leaders scramble for solutions
description: Inflation is like that crafty pickpocket you don’t see coming until your wallet’s gone. It’s the ghost haunting global economies, forcing world leaders to scramble for answers, yet often finding themselves chasing their own tails. title: Here’s When Bitcoin Could Explode to a New All-Time High, According to Crypto Analyst Jason Pizzino
description:
Crypto analyst Jason Pizzino is predicting when Bitcoin (BTC) could take off soaring to a new all-time high (ATH). In a new strategy session, Pizzino tells his 290,000 YouTube subscribers that as early as late next year BTC may begin a bull market cycle, taking the king crypto beyond the current ATH of about $69,000.
